[{"termstitle":"Can you give me information on how Michigan's Customer Choice works?"\,"termsdescription":"

We sure can.

\\n

1.     Your natural gas service consists of two main functions: 1) purchasing the gas and 2) distributing the gas.

\\n

2.     Your gas utility will continue to distribute gas to your location\, send you your bill\, check for gas leaks and respond to emergencies.

\\n

3.     But for purchasing the gas\, YOU HAVE A CHOICE! Compare rates snd plan options with Grand Rapids Energy®.

\\n

4.     It’s that simple. Michigan's Natural Gas Choice program gives customers the choice to purchase natural gas from suppliers other than their traditional utility company. Grand Rapids Energy® is an MPSC-certified natural gas supplier that you may select for your natural gas needs in Michigan. Would you like price stability? GRE can offer various fixed plans to meet your needs. Should you choose GRE as your natural gas supplier\, your local utility company in all cases will still maintain distribution channels that deliver gas to your home.

\\n

If you have any questions or need more information about natural gas service\, please call us at 1.800.841.1541. We are here to help.
\\n

\\n"\,"textIsRich":""},{"termstitle":"Who is Grand Rapids Energy? "\,"termsdescription":"

Grand Rapids Energy is a part of the SouthStar Energy Services® family\, a preeminent retail natural gas marketing company operating in eight states. SouthStar Energy Services combines the expertise and assets of a national supplier with the local market knowledge of a regional supplier and has the financial and structural resources needed to provide reliable and cost-effective natural gas.

\\n

For nearly 20 years\, SouthStar has built on the expertise of its parent company\, Southern Company Gas. A history of solid financial performance and stability\, as well as sophisticated in-house financial trading and risk management\, has placed SouthStar in a position of leadership.
\\n

\\n"\,"textIsRich":""},{"termstitle":"Why should I select Grand Rapids Energy as my natural gas supplier?"\,"termsdescription":"

If you choose one of our fixed plans and lock in your natural gas price for the next 6 or 12 months with GRE you can avoid price spikes and fluctuations. You don’t have this option with your regulated utility company\, but you do with us!

\\n

Here are three more great reasons to choose GRE:

\\n

1. We provide options.

\\n

Your utility can only offer you a variable plan. Want to lock in your rate with a fixed plan? GRE offers fixed plans and variable plans designed to suit your needs. Find the one that's right for you.

\\n

2. We care about our customers.

\\n

Our exceptional customer service is at the ready. Call 1.800.841.1541 to speak with one of our representatives.

\\n

3. We offer outstanding perks.

\\n

You can earn rewards when you refer friends to sign up for GRE. Check out the details of our Refer-a-Friend program. Also\, earn Delta SkyMiles just for paying your natural gas bill.  

\\n"\,"textIsRich":""},{"termstitle":"Will anything about my gas bill change?"\,"termsdescription":"

You will continue to receive one bill from your local gas utility company. The only change you will see on your bill is GRE supplying the gas commodity charges. Gas delivery charges will still originate from your local gas utility company. You will continue to make one payment to your utility company.

\\n"\,"textIsRich":""},{"termstitle":"How can I enroll with Grand Rapids Energy?"\,"termsdescription":"

That’s our favorite question. Enrolling is a simple process. Have a copy of your latest gas bill and call our Customer Care Center at 1.800.841.1541\, Monday-Friday from 8 a.m. – 5 p.m. ET\, to enroll. You can also enroll online.

\\n"\,"textIsRich":""},{"termstitle":"Can I continue to participate on my utility’s budget billing program if I select Grand Rapids Energy?"\,"termsdescription":"

Selecting GRE as your supplier will take you off the utility's budget billing program.

\\n

Additional questions? Call 1.800.841.1541 to speak with one of our customer service representatives.
\\n
